about_the_game:
Important: Color Dash is currently in development, so in the demo, you may encounter some bugs or gameplay issues. We would love to receive your feedback to help make the game better!

In the demo version of Color Dash, you can test your skills on 34 levels out of the 105 that will be available in the full version of the game. Each level is a vibrant adventure where every step leaves its mark. Control a drop of paint, overcome challenging levels filled with deadly traps, and enjoy the atmosphere of Color Dash Demo. Conserve your paint, find safe paths, and leave your unique mark on each level. Every move matters, and every drop is precious.
detailed_description:
Important: Color Dash is currently in development, so in the demo, you may encounter some bugs or gameplay issues. We would love to receive your feedback to help make the game better!

In the demo version of Color Dash, you can test your skills on 34 levels out of the 105 that will be available in the full version of the game. Each level is a vibrant adventure where every step leaves its mark. Control a drop of paint, overcome challenging levels filled with deadly traps, and enjoy the atmosphere of Color Dash Demo. Conserve your paint, find safe paths, and leave your unique mark on each level. Every move matters, and every drop is precious.
name: Color Dash Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Color Dash Demo invites you to a vibrant adventure where every step leaves a colorful mark. Experience 34 challenging levels, avoid deadly traps, conserve your paint, and find safe paths. Every move counts, and every drop is precious. Ready to make your mark in the Color Dash Demo?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
